original: 啟稟大人，本次招募<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>失敗，小女子認為對方肯定不是什麼有才之士。(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Enlighten your lord, this recruitment of <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> failed. The little girl thinks that the other party is definitely not a talented person. (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
